00003 !
00008 module tally
00009 
00010   implicit none
00011 
00012   private
00013 
00014   public :: tally_reset, bank_tally, perform_statistics
00015 
00016   !=============================================================================
00022   type, public :: tally_type
00023 
00024     double precision :: s1    = 0.0  ! s1 accumulator
00025     double precision :: s2    = 0.0  ! s2 accumulator 
00026     double precision :: mean  = 0.0  ! mean of tally
00027     double precision :: var   = 0.0  ! variance of tally
00028     double precision :: track = 0.0  ! the temp track var
00029 
00030   end type tally_type
00031 
00032 contains
00033 
00034   !=============================================================================
00039   subroutine tally_reset(this)
00040 
00041     type(tally_type), intent(inout) :: this
00042 
00043     this%track = 0.0
00044 
00045   end subroutine tally_reset
00046 
00047   !=============================================================================
00052   subroutine bank_tally(this)
00053 
00054     type(tally_type) :: this
00055 
00056     ! bank tally
00057     this%s1 = this%s1 + this%track
00058     this%s2 = this%s2 + this%track**2
00059 
00060   end subroutine bank_tally
00061 
00062   !=============================================================================
00070   subroutine perform_statistics(this, n_hist, dx)
00071 
00072     type(tally_type), intent(inout) :: this
00073     double precision, intent(in)                :: dx
00074     integer, intent(in)             :: n_hist
00075 
00076     ! compute mean
00077     this%mean = this%s1/(dx * n_hist)
00078 
00079   end subroutine perform_statistics
00080 
00081 end module tally
